item.description:
We had to change the time because the restaurant could not accomodate us at 6:45 pm due to how busy they are. So Please update your RSVP if you can't make it at 6:15 pm. And please be on time or they will give away our reserved spots.

It's been bitterly cold lately and Hot pot is the perfect cure to the cold weather.  Let's enjoy some delicious shabu hot pot, good conversation and company.

Please be on time as the restaurant does get very busy on a Saturday night.

After hot pot we will go for Karaoke (optional) nearby @ Do Rei Mi.

A reservation has been made there at 9.30pm, for those not going to Shabu Zen.

How to get there: take B train on greenline to Packards corner and walk a few blocks to the restaurant.

 

If you plan on driving there's limited street parking, more closer to super 88 area. Shabu Zen has parking in the back of the restaurant. It's a small lot, but worth checking if there's a parking space.

Please remember we do have a no-show rule. No shows are subject to removal from our group.

Please only RSVP if you plan to attend. And if your plans do change, update your RSVP to not attending.
